/** * A set of utility methods to create Handles which transform a Figure by using * its transform method. * * * @author Werntransformr * @version 3.0 2007-04-14 Renamed to TransformHandleKit to differentiate * it from the BoundsHandleKit. *
2.0 2006-01-14 Changed to support double precision coordinates. *
1.0 2003-12-01 Derived from JHotDraw 5.4b1. */
